titleStmt.title: Christian tolleration, or, Simply and singly to meet upon the account of religion, really to worship and serve the Lord, without any unlawful act to be done or intended, is not an offence against law and also concerning seditious sectaries, disloyal persons, and seditious conventicles punishable by the late act : and likewise concerning banishments ...
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

titleStmt.title: Christian tolleration, or, Simply and singly to meet upon the account of religion, really to worship and serve the Lord, without any unlawful act to be done or intended, is not an offence against law and also concerning seditious sectaries, disloyal persons, and seditious conventicles punishable by the late act : and likewise concerning banishments ...
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
Attributed to Richard Farnworth. cf. NUC pre-1956.
